tech_stack: React Query, Expo Notifications, DocumentPicker, AsyncStorage

features.name: Session & auth
features.description: Session hook manages Supabase login, role detection, and persistent storage; auth screen signs users in by resident ID and routes admins/FCs accordingly.

features.name: Dashboard & onboarding progress
features.description: Home dashboard surfaces FC onboarding steps, admin metrics, quick links, latest notices, and push notification prompts using Supabase data and Expo APIs.

features.name: FC registration form
features.description: Registration flow collects FC personal/contact/bank info, validates fields, and saves to Supabase with keyboard-aware layout and status handling.

features.name: Allowance consent
features.description: Allowance consent screen shows agreement slides, date picker, and submits consent details/status updates for the FC profile.

features.name: Document upload & notifications
features.description: Lists required documents, lets FCs pick/upload files to Supabase storage, and sends Expo push notifications to admins when submissions complete.

features.name: Exam applications & management
features.description: Screens for FC exam applications (life/non-life) and admin management of applicants, scheduling, and status updates.

features.name: Chat and messaging
features.description: 1:1 chat between FCs and admins plus admin messenger management with Supabase-backed threads and push alerts.

features.name: Notices & admin tools
features.description: Admin notice creation, notification list, registration and appointment helpers for onboarding oversight.

features.name: UI components & theming
features.description: Reusable themed UI elements (text/view wrappers, parallax scroll, haptic tabs, status toggle) and shared color tokens.
